resources.string: Open Activity Recognition Service is not installed. Install it with Google Play Store
Requires access to wearable sensor/activity data
Allows the app to access data from wearable sensors, such as heart rate monitors. Can receive periodic updates on physical activity levels.
Requires access and send wearable sensor/activity data
Allows the app to access data from wearable sensors, such as heart rate monitors. Can send periodic updates on physical activity levels.
